name: Veo 3.1 Video Generator Kie Ai
description:
Generates 8 seconds long videos using the Veo3.1 model from Google through the kie.ai API.
Supports text to video, and two image to video modes:  reference image to video, and first and last frames to video.

Pricing (as of November 2025): $0.30 per 8s video with veo3.1 Fast, and $1.25 per 8s video with veo3.1 Quality.

Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

model.description: Optional model to use. One of 'veo3' (for Veo 3.1 Quality) or 'veo3_fast' (Veo3.1 Fast generation model) ; default 'veo3_fast'

filename.description: Optional base filename for the created video (without extension). Defaults to None (uses task_id)

generation_type.description: Optional video generation type to perform. None for auto (adjusts according to the number of images), else one of 'TEXT_TO_VIDEO', 'FIRST_AND_LAST_FRAMES_TO_VIDEO', or 'REFERENCE_TO_VIDEO'. Case insensitive; works with spaces, missing '_', '-', e.g. 'text to video', 'texttovideo', 'referenceToVideo', 'reference-to-video'

image_paths.description: Optional list of 0-2 full local paths to input images; auto-determines generation mode if generation_type=None. Supported formats: .jpg, .jpeg, .png, .webp; max size 10MB each.

seed.description: Optional integer between 10000-99999 for reproducible generations

enable_translation.description: Wether to automatically translate prompt to English; default False

prompt.description: Required text prompt describing the desired video content, max 5000 characters

aspect_ratio.description: Optional aspect ratio of the generated video. One of '16:9', '9:16', 'Auto' (automatically center-cropped based on whether your uploaded image is closer to 16:9 or 9:16); default '16:9'

watermark.description: Optional text to overlay as watermark on video

local_path.description: Local path to the first downloaded video
